subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Tomas Holmstrom scored with 4 minutes 54 seconds left in the third period, when the puck hit him while he was standing in front of goalie Jean-Sébastien Giguère.
snippet: Tomas Holmstrom scored with 4 minutes 54 seconds left in the third period, when the puck hit him while he was standing in front of goalie Jean-Sébastien Giguère.
